law.history: Repealed 2004 Ky. Acts ch 189, sec. 31, effective July 13, 2004. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 440, sec. 9, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 119, sec. 41, effective June 17, 1954.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Confinement and destruction of dog found to have caused loss or damage to livestock, persons, or poultry -- Harborer of unlicensed dog forfeits rights in livestock fund.
